hydra.langs.json

Class JsonIoCoder<S1,S2>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hydra.compute.Coder<S1,S2,Value,java.lang.Object>
      • hydra.langs.json.JsonIoCoder<S1,S2>

  • public class JsonIoCoder<S1,S2>
extends Coder<S1,S2,Value,java.lang.Object>
    A bidirectional coder between Hydra's native JSON values and the JSON objects supported by json-io.
